Watercress salad, with grape tomatoes Dining table with leather seats Interior, dining area Sliced Tomahawk steak Grilled T bone steak Dining area, painting on the wall Crowded bar area Reviews Review by - Tripadvisor John F: This was really an amazing culinary experience. Everything I ordered was truly exquisite. If in Charleston, book a table do not think about it. Service was very attentive and made some great suggestions for ordering. Live music was great and not so loud as to take away from an intimate dinner. Fantastic place. Review by - Tripadvisor Ashley F: We had the most amazing meal at Hall's. The service is truly 5-star and the steak was probably the best steak I have ever eaten. We were here to celebrate a special event, and we were treated as such. Our servers took time to give us personalized recommendations and the sommelier helped us select a delicious wine. We would highly recommend and can't wait to dine again. We will be back soon! Review by - Tripadvisor Daniel B: Excellent food, attentive staff, outside seating. We were visiting Charleston on our journey across the country. We wanted a special dinner to celebrate. We choose an early seating on their outside patio, it was perfect. Safe and separate. Review by - Tripadvisor John S: Outstanding Dinner and exceptional service highly recommend the dry aged strip steak and the she crab soup. A dining experience you won’t forget definitely will go back on our next trip to Charleston. Oh and the whiskey bread pudding mouth watering!!! Review by - Tripadvisor Bob T: Halls is always superb and well deserves its recurrent place on the 10 best restaurants list. The service is always fantastic with the best and friendliest staff around town. The variety of steaks available - wet aged, dry aged, etc. - makes it impossible to not find one's favorite here. If your local this should be on your repeat list, if your visiting it should be a not to be missed. Events 5-course Wine Lunch featuring Domaine Pierre Usseglio & Fils Saturday February 7th Join us at Halls Chophouse for an exceptional five-course wine lunch featuring Domaine Pierre Usseglio & Fils. Enjoy a guided tour of Châteauneuf-du-Pape, with each course thoughtfully paired to showcase the elegance and depth of these renowned Rhône Valley wines, alongside a curated menu by the Halls Chophouse culinary team.
